resources.string: Get to Know About Medical Plant
Medicinal plants are a treasure trove of natural health solutions. Discover their benefits and how they can support your journey to a healthier life.
Leverage cutting-edge AI technology to identify medicinal plants effortlessly. Just take a photo, and our app will provide detailed information about the plantâ€™s name, uses, and health benefits.
Your Path to Better Health Starts Here
Embark on a journey toward a healthier lifestyle with trusted insights about medicinal plants. Let us guide you step by step to unlock the power of nature.
Let\'s sign you in, and start your journey!

Deskripsikan tanaman berikut dalam bahasa Indonesia, dengan ketentuan:\\n1. Jika bukan termasuk tanaman, maka beri respons JSON is_plant false, is_medical_plant false, dan lainnya null.\\n2. Jika termasuk tanaman tapi tidak memiliki khasiat pengobatan, maka beri respons JSON is_plant true, is_medical_plant false, nama tanaman, lalu kosongkan penyakit serta deskripsi (null).\\n3. Jika termasuk tanaman obat, maka berikan nama tanamannya, obat untuk penyakit apa saja, serta deskripsi khasiatnya.\\n\\nBerikan respons berupa JSON dengan format:\\n{\\\"is_plant\\\": boolean, \\\"is_medicinal_plant\\\": boolean, \\\"name\\\": nullable string, \\\"latin_name\\\": nullable string, \\\"disease\\\": nullable list string, \\\"description\\\": nullable string}
Are you sure you want to delete this plant?
